data_table.description: EPQ (Eysenck Personality Questionnaire-Revised) - The dataset includes data obtained through the Eysenck personality questionnaire, querying for tendencies of extrovert - introvert, neurotic and psychotic behavior (yes/no).

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: EPQ_MOODUPDOWN
variable.description: 1. Does your mood go up and down

variable.name: EPQ_NOTICEPEOPLETHINK
variable.description: 2. Do you take notice of what people think

variable.name: EPQ_TALKATIVEPERSON
variable.description: 3. Are you a talkative person

variable.name: EPQ_DEBTWORRY
variable.description: 4. Would being in debt worry you

variable.name: EPQ_GREEDY
variable.description: 5. Were you ever greedy

variable.name: EPQ_LIVELY
variable.description: 6. Are you lively

variable.name: EPQ_UPSETCHILDANIMALSUFFER
variable.description: 7. Would it upset you to see child or animal suffer

variable.name: EPQ_KEEPPROMISE
variable.description: 8. Do you always keep your promise

variable.name: EPQ_ENJOYPARTY
variable.description: 9. Can you enjoy yourself at a party

variable.name: EPQ_BLAMESOMEONE
variable.description: 10. Have you blamed someone for something that was your fault

variable.name: EPQ_GOODMANNERS
variable.description: 11. Are good manners important

variable.name: EPQ_FEELINGSHURT
variable.description: 12. Are your feelings easily hurt

variable.name: EPQ_GOODHABITS
variable.description: 13. Are all your habits good

variable.name: EPQ_INBACKGROUND
variable.description: 14. Do you keep in the background during social occasions

variable.name: EPQ_OFTENFEDUP
variable.description: 15. Do you often feel fed-up

variable.name: EPQ_STOLENITEMS
variable.description: 16. Have you ever taken anything belonging to someone else

variable.name: EPQ_GOOWNWAY
variable.description: 17.Do you prefer to go your own way

variable.name: EPQ_ENJOYHURTINGPEOPLEYOULOVE
variable.description: 18. Do you enjoy hurting the people you love

variable.name: EPQ_FEELINGSOFGUILT
variable.description: 19. Are you often troubled about feelings of guilt

variable.name: EPQ_ENEMIESHARMYOU
variable.description: 20. Do you have enemies who want to harm you

variable.name: EPQ_NERVOUSPERSON
variable.description: 21. Would you call yourself a nervous person

variable.name: EPQ_MANYFRIENDS
variable.description: 22. Do you have many friends

variable.name: EPQ_ENJOYJOKESTHATHURTOTHERS
variable.description: 23. Do you enjoy practical jokes that hurt others

variable.name: EPQ_WORRIER
variable.description: 24. Are you a worrier

variable.name: EPQ_DOASTOLDASCHILD
variable.description: 25. As a child did you do as you were told

variable.name: EPQ_GOODMANNERSMATTER
variable.description: 26. Do good manners and cleanliness matter to you

variable.name: EPQ_WORRYAWFULTHINGS
variable.description: 27. Do you worry about awful things that might happen

variable.name: EPQ_BROKENLOSTOTHERSTHINGS
variable.description: 28. Have you broken or lost something belonging to someone else

variable.name: EPQ_INITIATIVENEWFRIENDS
variable.description: 29. Do you take initiative in making new friends

variable.name: EPQ_TENSEHIGHSTRUNG
variable.description: 30. Would you call yourself tense or high strung

variable.name: EPQ_QUIETWITHPEOPLE
variable.description: 31. Are you quiet when you are with other people

variable.name: EPQ_MARRIAGEOLDFASHIONED
variable.description: 32. Do you think marriage is old fashioned and should be done away with

variable.name: EPQ_LIVENPARTY
variable.description: 33. Can you liven a dull party

variable.name: EPQ_SAYNASTYBADTHINGS
variable.description: 34. Have you ever said anything nasty about anyone

variable.name: EPQ_THINGSTASTESAME
variable.description: 35. Do most things taste the same to you

variable.name: EPQ_CHEEKYTOPARENTS
variable.description: 36. Were you cheeky to your parents

variable.name: EPQ_MIXINGWITHPEOPLE
variable.description: 37. Do you like mixing with people

variable.name: EPQ_WASHB4MEAL
variable.description: 38. Do you always wash before a meal

variable.name: EPQ_CHEATEDATGAME
variable.description: 39.Have you ever cheated at a game

variable.name: EPQ_ADVANTAGEOFSOMEONE
variable.description: 40. Have you ever taken advantage of someone

variable.name: EPQ_SAFEGUARDINGFUTURE
variable.description: 41. Do you think people spend too much time safeguarding future

variable.name: EPQ_GETPARTYGOING
variable.description: 42. Can you get a party going

variable.name: EPQ_TRYNOTTOBERUDETOPEOPLE
variable.description: 43. Do you try not to be rude to people

variable.name: EPQ_EMBARRASWORRYING
variable.description: 44. Do you worry too long after embarrassing experience

variable.name: EPQ_LOOKBEFORELEAP
variable.description: 45. Do you look before you leap

variable.name: EPQ_SUFFERNERVES
variable.description: 46. Do you suffer from nerves

variable.name: EPQ_OFTENFEELLONELY
variable.description: 47. Do you often feel lonely

variable.name: EPQ_TRUSTPEOPLETELLTRUTH
variable.description: 48. Can you trust people to tell the truth

variable.name: EPQ_PRACTICEPREACH
variable.description: 49. Do you always practice what you preach

variable.name: EPQ_HURTWHENFINDFAULTWITHYOU
variable.description: 50. Are you easily hurt when people find fault with you or the work you do

variable.name: EPQ_LATEWORKAPPT
variable.description: 51. Have you ever been late for work or an appointment

variable.name: EPQ_LIKEEXCITEMENT
variable.description: 52. Do you like excitement around you

variable.name: EPQ_LIKEOTHERSAFRAIDOFYOU
variable.description: 53. Would you like others to be afraid of you

variable.name: EPQ_PROCRASTINATE
variable.description: 54. Do you sometimes put off to tomorrow what you ought to do today

variable.name: EPQ_OTHERSTHINKYOURLIVELY
variable.description: 55. Do other people think of you as being lively

variable.name: EPQ_SPECIALDUTIESTOFAMILY
variable.description: 56. Do you believe one has special duties to family

variable.name: EPQ_ADMITMISTAKES
variable.description: 57. Are you always willing to admit mistakes

variable.name: EPQ_ESCALE
variable.description: EPQ-R Extraversion | (0-12 scale)

variable.name: EPQ_LSCALE
variable.description: EPQ-R Lie|(0-16 scale)

variable.name: EPQ_NSCALE
variable.description: EPQ-R Neuroticism | (0-12 scale)

variable.name: EPQ_PSCALE
variable.description: EPQ-R Psychoticism|(0-17 scale)
